summary: Out of enthusiasm, a Militia soldier abandons his platoon and decides to fight for the cause of the Revolution. His Lieutenant and the rest of the crew look for him during the confused night of 22-23 December 1989.
cast: Paul Ipate|Adi Carauleanu|Dragos Bucur|Tudor Istodor|Alexandru Potocean|Andi Vasluianu|Dana Dogaru|Ion Sapdaru|Mimi Branescu|Alexandru Georgescu|Virgil Aioanei|Valentin Antofi|Dorian Boguta|Viorel Comanici|Constantin Dita|Claudiu Dumitru|Mirela Oprisor|Gabriel Spahiu|Andrei Traian|Ana Ularu|Adrian Vancica
title: Hîrtia va fi albastrã
